text:
Hello everyone.  Hope you're enjoying Inbound.  Does anyone know if CMS supports:
• Dynamic routing / dynamic content (i.e. /news/story1-url, /news/story2-url)
• Cross-component communication (i.e. link on cmp1 triggers update on cmp2)
• Content approval workflows
• Reusable components / component bundling
• Personalization (users from XYZ city see layout 1, other users see layout 2)
• Login/protected pages

Hello everyone! 
I'm a mechanical engineer/technical product manager at an automotive company working on my MBA in marketing. I used HubSpot on my personal website which I built using WordPress but overall I love everything about HubSpot. I'm looking to challenge myself by participating in the themes challenge hackathon. If anyone is looking for teammates feel free to message me. Looking forward to learn so much from everyone here!
